# replaceCharacters(in:with:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the text in the specified range with the new string.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func replaceCharacters(in range: NSRange, with string: String)
```

## Parameters

- **range**: The specified range of the text to replace.
- **string**: The replacement string.

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder] for a complete description.

## Replacing Text

- **shouldReplaceCharacters(inRanges:with:)**: Returns whether the specified strings should be replaced.
- **didReplaceCharacters()**: Specifies whether text characters were replaced.
